subject: Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The Guardia Civil, the Spanish Interior Ministry's police force, is trying once more to attack doping in sport. It made a series of raids across the country against an alleged doping ring and arrested 11 people.
snippet: The Guardia Civil, the Spanish Interior Ministry's police force, is trying once more to attack doping in sport. It made a series of raids across the country against an alleged doping ring and arrested 11 people.
